input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product specifications and product specification information.

Product specification:
Product specification:
DMC 167GA 20-310 Cebelia Crochet Cotton, 405-Yard, Size 20, Black

Product specifications:
Perfect for fashion garments, bedspreads, table cloths, doilies and much more
Cebelia crochet cotton is made of double mercerized combed 100 percent cotton for a smooth silky finish
It is 1.76-ounces in weight and machine washable (max temp. 203 Fahrenheit/95 celsius)
Can be tumbled dry, bleached, dry cleaned and steamed
Highly colorfast
Available in black color
Measures 405-Yard length and comes in size 20

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Introducing the DMC 167GA 20-310 Cebelia Crochet Cotton, a high-quality and versatile yarn perfect for a variety of projects. This 405-yard length of size 20 black cotton is double mercerized for a smooth, silky finish and is made of 100 percent combed cotton for strength and durability.

With a 1.76-ounce weight and highly colorfast fibers, this crochet cotton is perfect for fashion garments, bedspreads, table cloths, doilies, and much more. It is machine washable (max temp. 203 Fahrenheit/95 celsius) and can be tumble dried, bleached, dry cleaned, and steamed, making it easy to care for.

This high-quality cotton yarn is a great choice for any crafter or designer looking for a reliable and beautiful material for their projects. Order your DMC 167GA 20-310 Cebelia Crochet Cotton today and take your crafting to the next level!
input_text.Response B: DMC 167GA 20-310 Cebelia Crochet Cotton is a high quality, double mercerized 100 percent cotton crochet thread. Perfect for fashion garments, bedspreads, table cloths, doilies and much more. Cebelia crochet cotton is made of double mercerized combed 100 percent cotton for a smooth silky finish. It is 1.76 ounces in weight and machine washable (max temp. 203 Fahrenheit/95 celsius). It can be tumbled dry, bleached, dry cleaned and steamed. Highly colorfast. Measures 405-yard length and comes in size 20. Available in black color. Imported from France.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
